title: Learning Environments and Adaptation: Identity Formation Through Mathematical Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: Emphasis on real-time feedback and mentoring using team-based collaboration tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate problem-solving skills by designing and implementing mathematics projects based on real-world vocational environments.
Learners can apply at least three collaboration strategies to reduce social distance with peers/instructors during project processes.
Learners can create a portfolio (digital/analog) reflecting their learning adaptation process as a project outcome
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
